data.name: V1ral
data.detailed_description:
V1ral is a classic fast-paced retro FPS that combines the looks and feel of an old school shooter like Quake, Doom, Hexen with modern game mechanics from games like Titanfall, Ghostrunner for an unparalleled gaming experience.

The game is set in a huge biological/mechanical planet sized supercomputer called Pioneer. Pioneer, though currently inactive, is presumed to be operated by a single operating system called „The Deep Blue“. At the time of setting Pioneer is being infested by a biological/digital virus type being, going by the name of „Mother“. Mother is a malignant, manipulative and self-serving entity that is harvesting the planet for its precious data fragments.

Various types of data fragments are scattered throughout the game and sometimes are dropped by the killed enemies (they act as health, weapon, ammo or special type pickups). With the help of countless numbers of her minions, Mother aims to take over the whole planet. Only C3v1n, a defective cleaning unit that was supposed to get decommissioned will start ruining Mother’s plans to harvest the data fragments.

  • Use various movement abilities to avoid enemies hoarding up on you.
  • Different types of enemies will require different types of weapons and solutions to beat.
  • Solving puzzles to advance will be a huge part of the game.
  • 8 level campaign, with each level introducing new enemies, boss fights and puzzles to solve.
  • Gore, blood, destructible enemy body parts. Everything a great shooter game needs will be in V1ral.

data.short_description: V1ral is a skill-based, fast-paced retro FPS involving gore, blood and carnage. Moving fast, shooting sharp and keeping a leveled head will be the only way to push through the hordes of enemies, otherwise expect to be devoured by them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 / AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Even though the graphics are pixel like, V1ral is violent. There will be gore, blood and dismembered body parts all throughout the game.
